page.title: 14Our law abiding community.
page.content:
The nearest police station is at Southwell and this is manned only on a part time basis. There is very seldom a police presence in the villages. On the whole, this is a very law abiding community, with little crime and very little vandalism.
Apart from the occasional{burglary, {there are a}few{minor offences}such as the theft of plants from gardens and the fouling of pavements by dogs. An excess of street litter, mainly in Fiskerton, coincides with the influx of summer visitors.
{Traffic offences}include illegal parking, again mainly in Fiskerton by fishermen, and motorists not adhering to the 30mph speed limits in the villages.
